claims.claim: Analytics processing time reduced from 5-10 minutes to under 5 seconds
claims.quote: Where pulling analytics used to take 5-10 minutes with the old system, they can be pulled in under 5 seconds.

claims.claim: System capacity increased from 1-2 users to up to 50 concurrent users
claims.quote: The system went from being able to handle 1-2 users at a time to up to 50

claims.claim: Sub-5 second response time for large-scale analytical interactive dashboards
claims.quote: This allows Reveel customers to run large-scale analytical interactive dashboards to identify savings with a sub-5 second response.

claims.claim: Enabled onboarding of larger customer groups
claims.quote: they are now able to onboard a larger group of customers to their shipping intelligence application
